results.title: Puerarin-V Improve Mitochondrial Respiration and Cardiac Function in a Rat Model of Diabetic Cardiomyopathy via Inhibiting Pyroptosis Pathway through P2X7 Receptors

results.title: Polydatin and polydatin-loaded chitosan nanoparticles attenuate diabetic cardiomyopathy in rats.
results.text_hl: The current study aimed to investigate the ameliorative effect of @CHEMICAL_polydatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C058229 @@@polydatin@@@-loaded @CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@ nanoparticles (@CHEMICAL_polydatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C058229 @@@PD@@@-CSNPs), @CHEMICAL_polydatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C058229 @@@polydatin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_polydatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C058229 @@@PD@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@) on @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Cardiomyopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058065 @@@diabetic cardiomyopathy@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
